com.koalog.util.swing
Class BaseApplication

java.lang.Object
  com.koalog.util.swing.BaseApplication
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoApplication
public class BaseApplication
extends java.lang.Object
implements AutoApplication

A base application class. As an AutoApplication, each application extending this class can be partially generated from an XML file.

getMainFrame

public javax.swing.JFrame getMainFrame()
Description copied from interface: AutoApplication
Get the main frame of the application. The different application items can be accessed from there. For instance, the menu bar can be modified to add menus and menu items.

Specified by:
getMainFrame in interface AutoApplication
Returns:
The application main frame.
See Also:
AutoApplication

getActions

public java.util.Map getActions()
Description copied from interface: AutoApplication
Get the application actions. Each action is uniquely identified by its name, used as its key in the returned Map instance.

Specified by:
getActions in interface AutoApplication
Returns:
A name to action map.

addBusyAction

public void addBusyAction()
Description copied from interface: AutoApplication
Notify the application that it is busy. This method should be called by any action while it is doing something in the event thread.
